newsitem.title: CANADA: WIC to buy Viedotron's CFCF.
newsitem.headline: WIC to buy Viedotron's CFCF.

text.p: WIC Western International Communications Ltd said it expects to announce Friday a deal to buy Montreal English-language television station CFCF from Groupe Videotron Ltee for a base price of C$70 million.
A WIC spokesman said that figure would rise by another C$30 million if within two years regulators grant the station permission to extend its market reach in the Montreal area.

He said WIC and pension fund manager Caisse de depot et placement du Quebec planned to form a joint venture for the deal. The move is seen as an important strategic step by WIC to expand its national presence.
